description: Experience great sound quality and complete freedom of movement with these Remanufactured Sennheiser RS110 OpenAire Wireless Headphones. The RS110 is the ideal entry into Sennheiser's line of 900-megahertz wireless headphones, and produce warm, detailed acoustics with strong-bass response. The lightweight design provides an easy-to-wear, comfortable fit and makes it possible to watch an entire movie without being distracted by the headphones. You'll hardly know you're wearing them, except for the great sound you're hearing! Ideally suited for Hi-fi and television use, with stereo-RF technology these supraural headphones will receive a signal through walls and ceilings for complete freedom of movement, so you'll never miss a beat when you walk into another room.The RS110 headphones are powered by two AAA batteries (included), which should last for up to 22 hours before needing replacement. Designed to ensure long-lasting comfort and service life by incorporating parts that can easily be replaced, these made-in-China headphones will last you quite some time. Get rid of the cables that are tying you down with the remanufactured RS110 wireless headphones from Sennheiser.What's in the BoxRS110 supraural wireless headphones, RF transmitter base station, two AAA batteries, and a 6.3-millimeter plug adapter.
title: Sennheiser Remanufactured RS 110 OpenAire Supraural RF Wireless Headphones with Enhanced Bass (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
